Sweden: The first edition of Carl Linnaeus' Systema Naturae is published.
Indonesia: Governor-General Dirk van Cloon dies, one of many victims of disease in Batavia.
China: The Yongzheng Emperor died. He was succeeded by his son the Qianlong emperor.
Burma: China annexes northern Shan States (present-day Kachin State, northern Shan State, and trans-Salween Shan State)
